markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Misdirecting Haversack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1242)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 10</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This brown leather satchel is made from a heavily oiled and rustic leather. The satchel is large enough to hold up to 1 Bulk worth of items.
